title: ResourceWarning over unclosed SSL Socket with datalad create-sibling-gitlab
body:
Running ``datalad create-sibling-gitlab`` with the following python-gitlab configuration (following the default in the [documentation](https://python-gitlab.readthedocs.io/en/stable/cli-usage.html#configuration))

```
adina@muninn in ~
❱ cat .python-gitlab.cfg
[global]
default = jugit
ssl_verify = true
timeout = 5

[jugit]
url = https://jugit.fz-juelich.de
private_token = <secret-token>
api_version = 4

```

results in a ResourceWarning about an unclosed SSL Socket:

```
(handbook2) adina@muninn in ~/repos/datalad on git:ux-6011+!
❱ datalad create-sibling-gitlab  -d . --site jugit --project datalad --layout flat                            1 !
/home/adina/repos/datalad/datalad/version.py:17: DeprecationWarning: datalad.version module will be removed in 0.16. Please use datalad.__version__ (no other __*_version__ variables are to be provided).
  warnings.warn(
create_sibling_gitlab(ok): . (dataset)
configure-sibling(ok): . (sibling)
action summary:
  configure-sibling (ok: 1)
  create_sibling_gitlab (ok: 1)
sys:1: ResourceWarning: unclosed <ssl.SSLSocket fd=3, family=AddressFamily.AF_INET, type=SocketKind.SOCK_STREAM, proto=6, laddr=('192.168.178.23', 56870), raddr=('134.94.130.31', 443)>
ResourceWarning: Enable tracemalloc to get the object allocation traceback
```
